thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: Mike Volosin
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 Mike Volosin

author: Mike Volosin
title: Mike Volosin
text: purchased a walkera v450 DO3 HELICOPTER WITHOUT DEVO 7 TRANSMITTER, received package. opened package should have been as advertised. helicopter ,instruction booklet, cd disk and small package with small allen wrenches bind plug' I open sealed package and have the heli;small bag with bind plug allen wrenches. NO INSTRUCTION BOOKLET,NO CD DISK; sent email to seller I was told to take a picture of the missing items after many emails still NO CD DISK AND INSTRUCTION BOOKLET EMAIL WALKERA IN CHINA THEY CANT HELP ME THEY ONLY SELL DRONES ANYMORE NOT HELICOPTERS SOOO -SORRRY. TAKE A PICTURE OF SOMETHING U DID NOT GET
